General.Name: Guangdong Biolight Meditech Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Biolight Meditech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, marketing, sale, and service of medical devices, medical consumables, and healthcare solutions. The company offers patient monitors, ECG monitoring equipment, fetal monitors, hemodialysis products, medical products, monitors, and accessories. It operates in Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, and Latin America. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Zhuhai City, China.
General.Address: No. 2 Innovation First Road, Zhuhai, China
